causes: policy violations in posts or ads
linked ad account or BM enforcement
immediate_actions: review Page Quality and violation notices
submit a single clear appeal with documentation
pause ads tied to the Page if applicable
prevention: follow content and ad policies strictly
use licensed images and videos only
keep business details accurate and consistent
